=== 11C: Implement Secure Remote Access Protocols Performance-based Question ===

Full tunnel offers better security.
  - Internet access mediated by the corporate network.
  - Alter the client's IP address and DNS servrs and may use a proxy.

  * SSTP is a native Windows application while L2TP/IPSEC supporty many platforms including MacOS.
    - L2TP/IPSEC: port 1701-UDP
    - SSTP:       port 443-TC

| Platform | VPN Protocol | VPN Protocol Firewall Port |
| OSX      | L2TP/IPSEC   | 1701 - UDP                 |
| Windows  | SSTP         | 443 - TCP                  |
